Name: Home Office Tasker
About the game: You no longer need to go to special applications or use cluttered websites to track your plans, HO Tasker is always open on your desktop, you can bring it on top of all other applications, minimize and expand it in 1 click and never miss a task or deadline again. Programs like this exist for you not to forget about your plans, but what if you forget to look at your to-do list? We have a solution! HO Tasker launches together with the system and is displayed on top of all applications, no unnecessary actions! Turn your PC on and immediately see your goals for the near future. HO Tasker is the best option for your home office! Our app works without live internet connection, and it's easier to figure it out than finding your missing sock.
